org.opensocial.client
Class OpenSocialOAuthClient

java.lang.Object
  org.opensocial.client.OpenSocialOAuthClient

public class OpenSocialOAuthClient
extends java.lang.Object

A utility object containing various static methods for dealing with OAuth in the context of OpenSocial. Included are static methods for digitally signing requests and fetching/parsing tokens from OpenSocial containers.

Author:
apijason@google.com (Jason Cooper), doll@google.com (Cassandra Doll)

Method Detail

signRequest

public static void signRequest(org.opensocial.client.OpenSocialHttpMessage request,
                               OpenSocialClient client)
                        throws OpenSocialRequestException,
                               java.io.IOException
Extracts pertinent properties from passed OpenSocialClient object and passes these along with OpenSocialHttpRequest object to a separate method which does the actual signing.

Parameters:
request - OpenSocialHttpRequest object which contains both the URL to sign as well as the POST body which must be included as a parameter when signing POST requests
client - OpenSocialClient object with various properties, both optional and required, used during the signing process
Throws:
OpenSocialRequestException
java.io.IOException
